Any school or college

Only for minorities (Parsi, Jain, Muslim, Sikh, Christian, Buddhist)

Santoor Women’s Scholarship

Higher education in sciences, humanities, and liberal arts

Only for the target subjects; must have passed class 10 and 12 from government school

- Only for Karnataka, Andhra pradesh and Telangana.

INR 24,000 per annum for full duration of studies

- Should be enrolled in a minimum 3 year full time diploma/graduate program.

- 60% of the scholarships are reserved for the underprivileged.

>60% in class XII; B.Tech/B.E. in Civil engineering; B.Arch (Architecture) 2nd year; MBA (construction project management) 1st year

Total family income < INR 5 lakh per annum

Maximum of INR 60,000

Pragati scheme: AICTE-Scholarship Scheme to Girl Child (SSGC)

Technical education: degree and diploma

Enrolled in regular full time diploma/degree course; Qualifying exam

Support for only one girl per family; family income < INR 6 lakh

Minimum of (INR 30,000 or tuition fees) + INR 2000 per month for 10 months

KSCSTE Prathibha Scholarship Programme

Under Graduation in basic sciences in Indian Universities

Score minimum 90% in all subjects and 95% aggregate in science subjects in Class 12; Score reduced for SC/ST

Only for students from Kerala

INR 12,000 - 24,000 per annum

Post Graduation in basic sciences in Indian Universities

INR 40,000 - 60,000 per annum

L’Oréal India For Young Women in Science Scholarship

Under Graduation in science

Minimum 85% in class 12 in PCM/PCB/PCMB

Family annual income < INR 4 lakh

INR 2,50,000 over 4 years

Sitaram Jindal Foundation Scholarship

Any integrated 5 year course: includes science and computer application

General category students of Class XI, Class XII (BPL), ITI, Graduation, Post Graduation, Engineering & Medicine Courses, Diploma courses, Physically disabled, widows & unmarried wards of ex-servicemen.

―

INR 400 - 2000 per month per course;

Extra INR 500 - 1000 per month for hostellers

Avasar Scholarship

5 years post matric scholarship

> 80% in class XI

Only for girls studying in Chennai, Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon

College fee, grant of INR 1,50,000, books, ,stationery, Bus pass, dresses, Daily allowance
